content.rendered:
Wednesday, October 2, 2024 

Today is a “B” Day 

Club Meetings and Information 

  • Are you ready for it? Pop Culture Icon Club’s first meeting is after school on Wednesday, October 2, in the Large Group Room with Ms. Schnorr. Cannot wait to see you there! 
     
  • The Mapletogian Newspaper club meets WEDNESDAYS afterschool in room 239- Come join the fun in writing for the newspaper! 
     
  • Chess Club will begin Wednesday, October 2 after dismissal. We will meet in room 210. See you then! 
     
  • The first meeting of the TV Studio Club will be this Wednesday after school in the library. If you’re interested in being on the morning announcements or helping to create the announcements, come see if this club is a good fit for you. Meet us in the library after school this Wednesday. See Mr. Todd or Mrs. Hubbs with any questions. 
     
  • Maple Avenue Middle School Musical Club is thrilled to announce our show for this year-Matilda! If you would like to audition or apply for a backstage position, please go to your house office and ask for an audition form or a backstage form. Auditions will be done online and will be accepted until October 12th. 
     
  • The Science Club will be holding its first meeting on Monday, October 7th, in Room 267. All students in grades 6 through 8 are invited to attend. Come watch exciting demonstrations, participate in hands-on experiments, and learn about our competitive Science Bowl team. 

  • Do you like singing? Then you should join voice club! It’s a super fun and no pressure way to learn about your singing voice. We have themed karaoke weeks and can help you choose and learn songs to sing as solos. It’s a great way to meet new people! You do not have to be in Chorus to join voice club- just come, sing, and have fun! We meet every Wednesday, every week. First meeting is October 9.
  • All 7th and 8th grade boys interested in trying out for Indoor Track, there will be an informational meeting on 10/9, immediately after school in Mr. Reilly’s room 282. Hope to see you there!

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!  

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
